title: Cry Cry
lyrics: ... (chuyển nhanh) ... ... ... ... ... - xxxxxx - xxxxxx - xxxxxx - Saeb-bal gan-jang-mi-cheo-roem Ga-shi-ga-teun mal-lo nal-jji-reun-neo uh uh uh Neon ma- chi mun shin cheo-reom Ji-u ryeo hal su-rok gip-ke-pae yeo uh uh Cry Cry Can't you see the music Bul-kkot cheo- reom ddeu-geob-ke You are my boy (Bm ở fret7 lên C#7 ở fret9 luôn) Baby can't you see that look at my eyes Seul-peu-me bba- jin nae du-nu-neul bwa uh- uh Bul-keun tae-yang-bo- da deo ddeu-geob-ke Sa-rang-haet-deon na-reul ul-li-ji-ma Nan joong- dokd-win-geot-cheo-reom Geu-ri-wo-ha- go ddo geu-ri-wo- hae Neon ma- chi ga-muk-cheo-reom Ni-ane nal ga-dwo- beo-ryeot-na- bwa uh uh Cry Cry Can't you see the music Bul-kkot cheo- reom ddeu-geob-ke You are my boy Baby can't you see that look at my eyes Seul-peu-me bba- jin nae du-nu-neul bwa uh- uh Bul-keun tae-yang-bo- da deo ddeu-geob-ke Sa-rang-haet-deon na-reul ul-li-ji-ma Break it! Come on Come on yo Make it! Come on Come on yo Take it! Come on Come on Come on - ... ... ... Baby can't you see that look at my eyes Seul-peu-me bba- jin nae du-nu-neul bwa uh- uh Bul-keun tae-yang-bo- da deo ddeu-geob-ke Sa-rang-haet-deon na-reul ul-li-ji-ma ah ah let's go Uh uh... Yeah... Let's dance - xxxxxx - xxxxxx - xxxxxx - xxxxxx Baby can't you see that look at my eyes Seul-peu-me bba- jin nae du-nu-neul bwa uh- uh Bul-keun tae-yang-bo- da deo ddeu-geob-ke Sa-rang-haet-deon na-reul ul-li-ji-ma Je-bal na-reul ddeo- na-ga-ji ma-ra Do-ra-on-dan ni mal mit-ji a- nha uh- uh Bul-keun tae-yang-bo- da deo ddeu-geob-ke Sa-rang-haet-deon na-reul ul-li-ji-ma ah ah let's go Break it! Come on Come on yo Make it! Come on Come on yo Take it! Come on Come on Come on - ... ... ... ... (strum chậm dần rồi kết ở F#m)
